description: Define secrets bundle format for encrypted credential backup
steps: Define SecretsBundle schema: { version, credentials: { anthropic?, openai?, telegram?, agentmail?, custom? } }
Secrets bundle is ALWAYS encrypted, regardless of checkpoint encryption level
Add secrets bundle as separate encrypted blob in checkpoint
Update checkpoint schema: { identity, memory, secrets: encryptedBlob }
Verify: extractSecrets captures all API keys from openclaw.json and auth-profiles.json
Verify: injectSecrets restores keys to correct locations
Verify: Secrets blob cannot be decrypted without AMCP private key
